greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expected lengths of random walks along the edges of a Platonic solid (in the order cube, octahedron, dodecahedron, icosahedron) from one vertex to an opposing one.
comment: For all Platonic solids (excluding the tetrahedron), the expected number of steps of a random walk from one vertex to its opposite vertex is indeed an integer.
results.author: _Jens Voß_, Jan 02 2014
